item.title: The optimistic VM
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230974707249233921 Introduction Okay, let’s get started our afternoon session. Our first talk I am very happy to introduce our speaker on optimistic virtual machines. Earlier in this conference we heard about optimistic roll-ups and I’m looking forward to this talk on optimistic virtual machines which is an up-and-coming approach on doing this. Why hello everyone. I am building on ethereum and in particular we’re going to make Optimism: the attitude that will save the day.
